includedlens: Samsung NX Lens (3D Lens not supported)
edit: Smart Filter (Miniature, Vignetting, Soft Focus, Sketch, Fish Eye, Classic, Retro, Oil Paint, Cartoon, Ink Painting, Cross Filter, Zooming Shot), Red-eye fix, Crop, Resize, Rotate, Face Retouch, Brightness, Contrast, Auto adjustment, Saturation, RGB adjustment, Color Temperature, Exposure
picturewizard: Standard, Vivid, Portrait, Landscape, Forest, Retro, Cool, Calm, Classic, Custom (1~3)
powersource: Rechargeable battery : B740AE/B740AC/B740AU/B740AK (3.8V/ 2330mAh), * The battery specifications or model may differ depending on your region.
smartfilterstillimage: Beauty Face, Best Face, Landscape, Macro, Action Freeze, Rich Tone, Waterfall, Silhouette, Sunset, Night, Firework, Light Trace, Continuous Shot, Kids, Food, Party/Indoor
opticalimagestabilization: Lens Shift (depends on Lens), OIS Mode1/Mode2/off
battery: Rechargeable battery: DC 5.0V, 0.55A via Micro USB port
drivemodes: Mode: Single, Continuous, Burst (5M), Self-timer, Bracket (AE/WB/PW/Depth), Continuous: Single, Continuous, Burst (5M), Self-timer, Bracket (AE/WB/PW/Depth)
ieffect: Yes (Aperture / Shutter speed / EV / ISO / WB)
meteringsystem: TTL 221(17x13) Block segment, Metering : Multi, Center-weighted, Spot, Metering range : EV 0-18 (ISO 100 30mm, F2)
smartauto: Smart Auto, Program, Aperture Priority, Shutter Priority, Manual, Panorama, Smart, Wi-Fi
modes: Auto, Daylight, Cloudy, Fluorescent (W, N, D), Tungsten, Flash, Custom, K(Manual)
wifi: IEEE 802.11b/g/n support (Smart Camera 3.0) . AutoShare . Remote Viewfinder Pro (Full manual Control) . Mobile Link (Group Share up to 4 people) . Photo Beam (Play back) . Auto Backup . Samsung Link(TV Link) . Home Monitor +
windows: Intel Core 2 Duo ® 1.66 GHz higher, AMD Athlon X2 Dual-Core 2.2 GHz higher, Minimum 512MB RAM (1GB or more recommended), Windows 7 / 8, 250MB of available hard-disk space (1GB and above recommend), USB 2.0 port, CD-ROM drive, nVIDIA Geforce 7600GT or higher / ATI X1600 series or higher, 1024x768 pixels, 16-bit color display compatible monitor (1280x1024, 32-bit color display recommended), Microsoft DirectX 9.0c or later
range: Selection : 1point ( Free selection ) Multi : Normal 21 points, Closeup 35 points, Face Detection : Max. 10 faces, Object Tracking AF
options: Single image, Thumbnails (15/28 images), Slide show, Movie
macintosh: Mac OS 10.5 or higher (except PowerPC), Minimum 256MB RAM (512MB or more recommended), Minimum 110MB of available hard-disk space, USB 2.0 port, CD-ROM drive
